name: Escape from the cursed city
description:
"As a member of the Special Forces, you will be alone in a city prison after a misguided mission. After an accident in a secret laboratory, the city invaded by zombies. 
As a soldier, your duty is to find the lab and destroy it. Then escape the city, kill as many zombies as you can. Get started, soldier." 


This game is made in Gdevelop. Currently the first 10 levels are ready. If you see a grey bar at the top of the screen when the game starts, you can find the fix in the options menu.
This is a one person project and my first game, so there might still be some mistakes.
But I keep improving the game.
